response.overview: From a Venezuelan immigrant delivering traditional cuisine via bicycle in San Francisco to NYCâ€™s most iconic driving instructor preparing students for the road ahead, the characters in this collection of documentary short films live out their passions on a daily basis. Titles: Arepas en Bici | Livestreams with GrandmaPuzzles | The Endless Wave | TRIP-tych! | Looking Forward | Shanti Rides Shotgun | I Am Louise
